$comment: File ownership manifest for multi-agent coordination

src/interfaces/.rule: Read-only for Build agents, modifications require Architect approval

src/buildings/.extensions: ANY building agent can add new building type files

src/entities/.extensions: ANY entity agent can add new entity type files

src/index.ts.rule: Only Phase Manager modifies barrel exports

package.json.rule: Sequential modification only, one agent per wave

testOwnership.rule: Test files follow source ownership - if agent owns src/foo.ts, they own tests/foo.test.ts
